column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I'm so glad the bar is still open during covid crisis. The service is awesome
column2: I order the spicy cheese and garlic Brussel sprouts
column3: so delicious! Got their burger and pork chops super delicious
column4: not dry at all. Their drinks were also strong and affordable. Did an reservation online
column5: just to be safe and good thing i did
column6: got busy towards the night.Went with my fianc√© for anniversary and it was a good joint. Still new to houston and trying new places. Overall it was good experience
